name: YouTube – Hide Player Icons
description: Don't like the icons that “pops up” when you press; play, pause, rewind, forward or change the volume? Well now you can get rid of them! ➤ Bezel is the play, pause etc icons. ➤ Branding is the channel logo down the right on videos.

user.name: Crystallis
user.about: Commenting and rating is always appreciated. ツ

style_setting_options.label: Bezel & Branding
